It is to be irreproachable in the eyes of all the thus-gone ones.

translated: This is the first pure basis of the perfection of generosity for bodhisattvas.

original: de lta ba brgyad yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de /
analyzed: de lta ba brgyad yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de /
translated: They give gifts with eight pure views.

original: brgyad po dag gang zhe na /
analyzed: brgyad po dag gang zhe na /
translated: What are the eight?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: bdag tu lta ba yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang /
analyzed: bdag tu lta ba yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang /
translated: giving gifts with the pure view of self, and similarly, giving gifts with the pure view of sentient beings, the pure view of life force, the pure view of person, the pure view of annihilation, the pure view of permanence,

original: 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: the pure view of origination, and the pure view of destruction.

original: lta ba brgyad po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin bar byed do //
analyzed: lta ba brgyad po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin bar byed do //

analyzed: de bag la nyal ba bzhi yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de /
translated: They give gifts having abandoned four latent tendencies.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: so so'i skye @358a *//
analyzed: so so'i skye @358a *//
translated: They are the latent tendencies of

analyzed: bo'i chos kyi bag la nyal dang / nyan thos kyi chos kyi bag la nyal dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bag la nyal dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i bag la te; bag la nyal ba bzhi po de dag yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do //
translated: the latent tendency to the Dharma of the ≈õrƒÅvakas, the latent tendency to the Dharma of the pratyekabuddhas, and the latent tendency of the connections of habitual tendencies.

analyzed: de 'du shes bzhi yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de /
translated: ‚ÄúThey give gifts having abandoned four perceptions:

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /

original: rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang / gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa ste /
analyzed: rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang / gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa ste /

analyzed: 'du shes bzhi po de dag yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do //

analyzed: lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa ste /

analyzed: rnam pa bzhi po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do //

original: de chags pa gsum las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de /
analyzed: de chags pa gsum las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de /

original: gsum gang zhe na /

translated: Attachment to the maturation of the gift, attachment to the gift itself, and attachment to the dedication of the gift to the goal of great prosperity.

original: gsum po de dag las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: gsum po de dag las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do //
translated: He gives gifts having transcended these three attachments.

original: de 'jigs pa gsum las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de /
analyzed: de 'jigs pa gsum las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de /
translated: He gives gifts having transcended three fears.

original: gsum gang zhe na /
analyzed: gsum gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three?

analyzed: lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'jigs pa dang / rlom sems kyi 'jigs pa dang / bdud kyi las kyi 'jigs @358b pa ste /

original: gsum po de dag las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: gsum po de dag las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do //

original: de rgya bzhis btab nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de /
analyzed: de rgya bzhis btab nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de /

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / sems can stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / byang chub stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa ste /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / sems can stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / byang chub stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa ste /
translated: He gives gifts sealed with the four seals: the seal of inner emptiness, the seal of outer emptiness, the seal of the emptiness of beings, and the seal of the emptiness of awakening.

original: rgya bzhi po de dag gis btab nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: rgya bzhi po de dag gis btab nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do //

original: de brtson 'grus rtsom pa bzhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de /
analyzed: de brtson 'grus rtsom pa bzhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de /

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /

original: sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste /

translated: The striving to satisfy all beings, the striving to accomplish all the qualities of a buddha, the striving to perfect the major and minor marks, and the striving to purify a buddhafield.

original: brtson 'grus rtsom pa bzhi po de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom pa bzhi po de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed do //

original: de dran pa bzhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de /
analyzed: de dran pa bzhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de /

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /

analyzed: dran pa bzhi po de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed do //

original: gsum gang zhe na /
analyzed: gsum gang zhe na /

analyzed: bdag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gyi 'khor yongs su dag pa @359a *//

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

original: rigs kyi bu /

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

analyzed: 'di ni rnam pa gnyis so //

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gsum ste /

translated: Having eliminated all physical harm, one attains a pure body; having eliminated all verbal faults, such as flattery and deception, one attains a pure speech; and having eliminated the thoughts of desire, malice, and violence, one attains a pure mind.üîΩThese are the three.

original: gsum mo // rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: gsum mo // rigs kyi bu /

original: 'di lta ste /

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

translated: By not transgressing the trainings, one recollects the Buddha. By having no regrets about one‚Äôs discipline, one recollects the Dharma. By observing the Buddha‚Äôs trainings, one recollects the Sa·πÖgha. By completely abandoning all afflictions, one recollects generosity.

original: skye ba thams cad la mi gnas pas tshul @360b khrims rjes su dran pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas lha rjes su dran pa ste /
analyzed: skye ba thams cad la mi gnas pas tshul @360b khrims rjes su dran pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas lha rjes su dran pa ste /
translated: By not dwelling in any births, one recollects discipline. By perfecting all virtuous qualities, one recollects the gods.

original: 'di ni rnam pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di ni rnam pa drug go /
translated: These are the six aspects.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Noble son,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bdun te /
translated: there are seven aspects to the bodhisattvas‚Äô pure conduct of the perfection of discipline.

original: rnam pa bdun gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa bdun gang zhe na /
translated: What are the seven aspects?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par dad pa dang / bdag nyid dbang du byas te ngo tsha shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du byas te khrel yod pa dang / nga rgyal med pas gus pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba med pas nges pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par dad pa dang / bdag nyid dbang du byas te ngo tsha shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du byas te khrel yod pa dang / nga rgyal med pas gus pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba med pas nges pa dang /
translated: faith in all the qualities of the Buddha, self-control and a sense of shame, a sense of integrity by making all the buddhas present, respect through being free of pride, certainty through being free of anxiety about oneself and others,

original: 'jig rten pha rol tu kha na ma tho ba la 'jigs par lta bas rnam par 'tshe ba med pa dang / sems kyi yongs su gdung ba nye bar zhi bas khon du mi 'dzin pa ste /

translated: non-violence through seeing fear in the other world, and non-reproach through the pacification of mental anguish.

original: 'di ni rnam pa bdun no //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam pa bdun no //
translated: These are the seven aspects.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad de /

analyzed: rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

original: zang zing med pa'i sems kyis tshul mi 'chos pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bas kha gsag med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis chog shes pas thob kyis 'jal ba mi byed pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pas 'phags pa'i rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
analyzed: zang zing med pa'i sems kyis tshul mi 'chos pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bas kha gsag med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis chog shes pas thob kyis 'jal ba mi byed pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pas 'phags pa'i rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
translated: They are not hypocritical, with a mind free of materiality; they are not flattering, having given up all grasping; they are not deceitful, being naturally content; they are perfect in upholding the lineage of the noble ones, having the qualities of training and few possessions;

original: dgon pa la gnas pa rjes su mi gtong bas lus la mi lta ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas srog la mi lta ba dang / 'du 'dzi spong bas @361a *//
analyzed: dgon pa la gnas pa rjes su mi gtong bas lus la mi lta ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas srog la mi lta ba dang / 'du 'dzi spong bas @361a *//
translated: they do not care for their bodies, not abandoning dwelling in the wilderness; they do not care for their lives, upholding the sublime Dharma; they delight in solitude, avoiding crowds;

original: gcig pu na dga' ba dang / khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs pas chos kyi dga' ba la mos pa ste /
analyzed: gcig pu na dga' ba dang / khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs pas chos kyi dga' ba la mos pa ste /

original: rigs kyi bu /

analyzed: rnam pa dgu gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

original: kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu po rnams 'dul ba dang; sems can gyi gnas dgu po rnams las shin tu 'da' ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po rnams kyi rtsa ba yongs su spyod pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med pas sems zhi ba dang /
analyzed: kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu po rnams 'dul ba dang; sems can gyi gnas dgu po rnams las shin tu 'da' ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po rnams kyi rtsa ba yongs su spyod pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med pas sems zhi ba dang /
translated: to discipline the nine bases of hostility, to transcend the nine abodes of sentient beings, to purify the roots of the nine successive stages of meditative equipoise, to pacify the mind through freedom from distress,

original: sems las su rung bas zhi gnas kyi tshogs kun du tshol ba dang / cho ga dang / tshul khrims dang / lta ba nyams pa las shin tu 'das pas mi lhod pa dang / theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad la mi slu ba dang /
analyzed: sems las su rung bas zhi gnas kyi tshogs kun du tshol ba dang / cho ga dang / tshul khrims dang / lta ba nyams pa las shin tu 'das pas mi lhod pa dang / theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad la mi slu ba dang /
translated: to seek the requisites for meditative concentration through mental flexibility, to be diligent through transcending the degeneration of ritual, morality, and view, to be undeceiving to all sentient beings through perfecting the Great Vehicle,

original: tshul khrims la skyon med pas shin tu mthar thug pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pas sems phyed pa ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims la skyon med pas shin tu mthar thug pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pas sems phyed pa ste /
translated: to be well-established through faultless morality, and to be mentally liberated through skill in dedication.

original: 'di ni rnam pa dgu'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam pa dgu'o //
translated: These are the nine aspects.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bcu ste /

analyzed: pa dang / g-yo sgyu dang bral te drang zhing tshul 'chos @361b pa med pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / bslab pa thams cad dang mi 'gal ba dang phan par sbyor ba'i dngos po'i sngon du 'gro bas rjes su ston pa dang / dul zhing cang shes kyi sa'i phyir sems dmu rgod ma yin pa dang /
translated: They are free of deceit and pretense and have an honest and sincere attitude, they are not in conflict with any of the precepts and they instruct others by first applying the precepts themselves, they are not wild-minded, for they are disciplined and have the level of being a thoroughbred,

original: bdag nyid byed pas sems can thams cad kyi slob mar gyur pa dang / nga rgyal med pas sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba dang / srog gi dbang por chos mdun du byed kyi /

translated: They are to be a student of all sentient beings by being self-directed; to bow down and pay homage to those who are worthy of honor by being free of pride; and to place the Dharma in the forefront, not the life force.

original: 'jig rten gyi zang zing mdun du mi byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi zang zing mdun du mi byed pa ste /

original: rigs kyi bu /

analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are

original: so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang / bsgom pa'i stobs so //üîΩde la gang lus dang sems la gnas te /
analyzed: so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang / bsgom pa'i stobs so // de la gang lus dang sems la gnas te /
translated: the power of discernment and the power of meditation.

original: bzod pa ni so sor rtog pa'i stobs so //
analyzed: bzod pa ni so sor rtog pa'i stobs so //
translated: Among them, the patience that is based on body and mind is the power of discernment.

original: gang chos thams cad la gnas te bzod pa ni bsgom pa'i stobs so //
analyzed: gang chos thams cad la gnas te bzod pa ni bsgom pa'i stobs so //
translated: The patience that is based on all phenomena is the power of meditation.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: ‚ÄúSon of noble family,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni gang sems can thams cad la bdag med pas bzod cing /üîΩchos thams cad la bden par bzod de /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni gang sems can thams cad la bdag med pas bzod cing / chos thams cad la bden par bzod de /
translated: Furthermore, the bodhisattvas‚Äô conduct of the perfection of patience is pure in that they are patient with all sentient beings because they are selfless.üîΩThey are patient with all phenomena as being true.

original: gang chos thams cad la mi bzod pa de ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: gang chos thams cad la mi bzod pa de ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Patience with all phenomena is pure.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩ'di la don dam par gang bzod pa'am /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di la don dam par gang bzod pa'am /
translated: Why is that?

original: mi bzod pa'i chos gang yang med de /
analyzed: mi bzod pa'i chos gang yang med de /
translated: Ultimately, there is no phenomenon that is patient or impatient.üîΩThere is no phenomenon that is patient or impatient.

original: gang chos thams cad khas mi len pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: gang chos thams cad khas mi len pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: Patience is pure for those who do not accept any phenomenon.

original: chos khas len pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: chos khas len pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do //
translated: There is no pure patience for those who accept phenomena.

original: gang chos thams cad la zhum pa med pa ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: gang chos thams cad la zhum pa med pa ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: Patience is pure for those who are not discouraged by any phenomenon.

original: zhum pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: zhum pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do //
translated: There is no pure patience for those who are discouraged.

original: gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa de ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa de ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: Patience is pure for those who do not grasp at any phenomenon.

original: 'dzin pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med de //
analyzed: 'dzin pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med de //
translated: There is no pure patience for one who grasps.

original: gang la bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / chos med pa ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: gang la bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / chos med pa ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: Patience is pure for one who has no self, no sentient beings, and no phenomena.

original: bdag dang / sems can dang / chos la gnas pa la ni bzod pa @363b yongs su dag pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: bdag dang / sems can dang / chos la gnas pa la ni bzod pa @363b yongs su dag pa gang yang med do //
translated: There is no pure patience for one who dwells in self, sentient beings, and phenomena.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: there are two kinds of pure conduct in the bodhisattva‚Äôs perfection of patience:

original: gnyis gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnyis gang zhe na /
translated: what are the two?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are

original: lus rnam par 'phrul pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: lus rnam par 'phrul pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: the pure patience of the magical display of the body and the pure patience of the suchness of all phenomena.

original: gnyis po de dag go /
analyzed: gnyis po de dag go /
translated: These are the two.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: this is the bodhisattva‚Äôs pure conduct in the perfection of patience.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat is the bodhisattvas‚Äô pure conduct of the perfection of diligence?

original: byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / dgos pa dang dgos pa ma yin pa la zhum pa med pa dang / rtsom pas mi ngal ba dge ba'i rtsa ba gsog pa la mi zhen pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / dgos pa dang dgos pa ma yin pa la zhum pa med pa dang / rtsom pas mi ngal ba dge ba'i rtsa ba gsog pa la mi zhen pa /
translated: It is never abandoning the mind of awakening, never being discouraged by what is necessary or unnecessary, never tiring of undertaking things, and not being attached to accumulating roots of virtue.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa /
translated: It is being dedicated to seeking all phenomena that are irreversible from these perfections.

original: chos thams cad ston par brtson pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad ston par brtson pa /
translated: It is being dedicated to teaching all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa la spro ba /
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa la spro ba /
translated: It is being enthusiastic about upholding all phenomena.

original: mchod sbyin chen po las sgrol ba /
analyzed: mchod sbyin chen po las sgrol ba /
translated: It is being liberated from great sacrifices.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa la yongs su mi skyo ba /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa la yongs su mi skyo ba /
translated: It is never tiring of bringing sentient beings to maturity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par sbyong ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par sbyong ba /
translated: It is purifying buddha realms.

original: theg pa dman pa las shin tu 'da' ba /
analyzed: theg pa dman pa las shin tu 'da' ba /
translated: It is transcending the Lesser Vehicle.

original: sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
analyzed: sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
translated: It is fulfilling one‚Äôs former promises.

original: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa'i tshogs bsags pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa'i tshogs bsags pa /
translated: It is the accumulation of the collections of generosity, morality, and learning.

original: sngon gyi bsod nams bsags pa chud mi gzon pa /
analyzed: sngon gyi bsod nams bsags pa chud mi gzon pa /
translated: It is not wasting the previously accumulated merit.

original: nga rgyal med pas sems can thams cad la rim gror bya'o cog byed pa ste /
analyzed: nga rgyal med pas sems can thams cad la rim gror bya'o cog byed pa ste /
translated: It is serving all sentient beings without pride.

original: 'di ni brtson @364a *//üîΩ'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni brtson @364a *// 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is the perfection of effort.

original: de'i yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de'i yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is its purification?

original: gang lus la mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan du shes pa /
analyzed: gang lus la mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan du shes pa /
translated: It is the knowledge of the body as a magical creation and a reflection.

original: tshig la brjod du med par shes pa /
analyzed: tshig la brjod du med par shes pa /
translated: It is the knowledge of speech as inexpressible.

original: sems la shin tu nye bar zhi bar shes pa /üîΩzad pa shes pa rnam par rig pa /
analyzed: sems la shin tu nye bar zhi bar shes pa / zad pa shes pa rnam par rig pa /
translated: It is the knowledge of the mind as utterly calm.üîΩIt is the knowledge of cessation.

original: zad pa shes pa rab tu shes pa /
analyzed: zad pa shes pa rab tu shes pa /
translated: It is the knowledge of the knowledge of cessation.

original: mi skye ba shes pa nges par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: mi skye ba shes pa nges par rtogs pa'o //
translated: It is the realization of the knowledge of non-arising.

original: de rtsom pa gsum las rnam par grol bar brtson 'grus rtsom ste /
analyzed: de rtsom pa gsum las rnam par grol bar brtson 'grus rtsom ste /
translated: It is the effort of one who is free from the three kinds of undertakings.

original: gsum gang zhe na /
analyzed: gsum gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three?

original: gnas pa'i rtsom pa dang / dmigs pa'i rtsom pa dang / yongs su rtog pa'i rtsom pa ste /
analyzed: gnas pa'i rtsom pa dang / dmigs pa'i rtsom pa dang / yongs su rtog pa'i rtsom pa ste /
translated: The undertaking of dwelling, the undertaking of the object, and the undertaking of investigation.

original: gsum po de dag go /
analyzed: gsum po de dag go /
translated: These are the three.

original: de chags pa gsum la mi chags par brtson 'grus rtsom ste /
analyzed: de chags pa gsum la mi chags par brtson 'grus rtsom ste /
translated: They are diligent in not being attached to the three.

original: gsum gang zhe na /
analyzed: gsum gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three?

original: mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa /
analyzed: mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa /
translated: They are not attached to the eye, form, or eye consciousness.

original: rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa /
analyzed: rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa /
translated: They are not attached to the ear, sound, or ear consciousness.

original: sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa /
analyzed: sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa /
translated: They are not attached to the nose, smell, or nose consciousness.

original: lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa /
analyzed: lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa /
translated: They are not attached to the tongue, taste, or tongue consciousness.

original: lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa /
analyzed: lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa /
translated: They are not attached to the body, touch, or body consciousness.

original: yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa'o //
analyzed: yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa'o //
translated: They are not attached to the mind, phenomena, or mind consciousness.

original: de 'dzin pa med cing 'dor ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas sbyin pa mi len /
analyzed: de 'dzin pa med cing 'dor ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas sbyin pa mi len /
translated: They are diligent in not grasping and not rejecting. They do not take up generosity.

original: ser sna mi 'dor /üîΩtshul khrims mi len /
analyzed: ser sna mi 'dor / tshul khrims mi len /
translated: They do not reject stinginess.üîΩThey do not take up discipline.

original: 'chal ba'i tshul khrims mi 'dor /
analyzed: 'chal ba'i tshul khrims mi 'dor /
translated: They do not reject immorality.

original: bzod pa mi len /
analyzed: bzod pa mi len /
translated: They do not take up patience.

original: gnod sems mi 'dor /üîΩbrtson 'grus mi len /
analyzed: gnod sems mi 'dor / brtson 'grus mi len /
translated: They do not reject malice.üîΩThey do not take up diligence.

original: le lo mi 'dor /
analyzed: le lo mi 'dor /
translated: They do not reject laziness.

original: bsam gtan mi len /
analyzed: bsam gtan mi len /
translated: They do not take up concentration.

original: @364b g-yeng ba mi 'dor /
analyzed: @364b g-yeng ba mi 'dor /
translated: He does not reject distraction.

original: shes rab mi len /
analyzed: shes rab mi len /
translated: He does not take up wisdom.

original: 'chal pa'i shas  rab mi 'dor /
analyzed: 'chal pa'i shas  rab mi 'dor /
translated: He does not reject confusion.

original: dge ba mi len /
analyzed: dge ba mi len /
translated: He does not take up virtue.

original: mi dge ba mi 'dor /
analyzed: mi dge ba mi 'dor /
translated: He does not reject nonvirtue.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi len /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi len /
translated: He does not take up the awakening of the buddhas.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi 'dor ro //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi 'dor ro //
translated: He does not reject the awakening of the ≈õrƒÅvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: de len pa med cing 'dor ba med pas gnyis yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de len pa med cing 'dor ba med pas gnyis yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur te /
translated: Since he neither takes up nor rejects, he is endowed with effort that is purified of the two.

original: de la gnyis gang zhe na /üîΩgang nang gi kun du ldang ba las /
analyzed: de la gnyis gang zhe na / gang nang gi kun du ldang ba las /
translated: What are the two?üîΩThe two are the internal agitation

original: dmigs pa kun du ldang ba dang / phyi rol tu rnam par shes pa mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang par 'gyur ba de ni gnyis zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa kun du ldang ba dang / phyi rol tu rnam par shes pa mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang par 'gyur ba de ni gnyis zhes bya'o //
translated: and the external agitation of consciousness following the signs.

original: de la gnyis yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gnyis yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the purification of the two?

original: gang nang nye bar zhi bas phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba dang / spros pa med pa ste /
analyzed: gang nang nye bar zhi bas phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba dang / spros pa med pa ste /
translated: It is the internal pacification and the external non-movement,

original: 'di ni gnyis yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gnyis yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o //
translated: which is called the purification of the two.

original: gang rgyu ba med cing ma spros pa /
analyzed: gang rgyu ba med cing ma spros pa /
translated: It is the absence of movement and the absence of conceptual proliferation.

original: spros pa med pa'i brtson 'grus 'di lta bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: spros pa med pa'i brtson 'grus 'di lta bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: This kind of unelaborate effort is the bodhisattva‚Äôs pure practice of the perfection of effort.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: ‚ÄúNoble son,

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
translated: you may wonder about the bodhisattvas‚Äô pure practice of the perfection of concentration.üîΩBodhisattvas practice the branches of concentration, and having practiced them, they investigate them.

original: gang bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams yang dag par bsgrub cing yang dag par bsgrubs nas so sor rtog pa dang / so sor brtags nas kyang snyoms par 'jug pa yin te /üîΩde bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te /
analyzed: gang bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams yang dag par bsgrub cing yang dag par bsgrubs nas so sor rtog pa dang / so sor brtags nas kyang snyoms par 'jug pa yin te / de bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te /
translated: Having investigated them, they enter into equipoise.

original: bsam gtan mi byed /
analyzed: bsam gtan mi byed /
translated: When they practice concentration, they do not do so while dwelling on form.

original: de bsam gtan byed kyang tshor ba la ma yin /
analyzed: de bsam gtan byed kyang tshor ba la ma yin /
translated: They do not practice concentration while dwelling on feeling,

original: 'du shes la ma yin /üîΩ'du byed rnams la ma yin /
analyzed: 'du shes la ma yin / 'du byed rnams la ma yin /
translated: perception,üîΩformation,

original: rnam par shes pa la gnas @365a *//üîΩte bsam gtan mi byed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la gnas @365a *// te bsam gtan mi byed do //
translated: or consciousness.

original: de bsam gtan byed kyang mig la gnas te /
analyzed: de bsam gtan byed kyang mig la gnas te /
translated: When they practice concentration, they do not do so while dwelling on the eyes,üîΩthe ears,üîΩthe nose,üîΩthe tongue,üîΩthe body,

original: bsam gtan mi byed /
analyzed: bsam gtan mi byed /
translated: or the mind.

original: de bsam gtan byed kyang rna ba la gnas te /
analyzed: de bsam gtan byed kyang rna ba la gnas te /
translated: Even if one practices concentration, it is based on the ear.

original: bsam gtan mi byed /üîΩsna la ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan mi byed / sna la ma yin /
translated: Although they practice concentration, they do not practice concentration based on the ears.üîΩThey do not practice concentration based on the nose.

original: lce la ma yin /
analyzed: lce la ma yin /
translated: They do not practice concentration based on the tongue.

original: lus la ma yin /üîΩyid la gnas te /
analyzed: lus la ma yin / yid la gnas te /
translated: They do not practice concentration based on the body.

original: bsam gtan mi byed do //üîΩde bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te /
analyzed: bsam gtan mi byed do // de bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te /
translated: They do not practice concentration based on the mind.

original: bsam gtan mi byed /
analyzed: bsam gtan mi byed /
translated: Although they practice concentration, they do not practice concentration based on form.

original: sgra la ma yin /üîΩdri la ma yin /üîΩro la ma yin /
analyzed: sgra la ma yin / dri la ma yin / ro la ma yin /
translated: They do not practice concentration based on sound.üîΩThey do not practice concentration based on smell.

original: reg bya la ma yin /üîΩchos la gnas te /
analyzed: reg bya la ma yin / chos la gnas te /
translated: They do not practice concentration based on taste.üîΩThey do not practice concentration based on touch.

original: bsam gtan mi byed do //üîΩde bsam gtan byed kyang lus la rnam par rtog pa la gnas te /
analyzed: bsam gtan mi byed do // de bsam gtan byed kyang lus la rnam par rtog pa la gnas te /
translated: They do not practice concentration based on mental phenomena.

original: bsam gtan mi byed /üîΩde bsam gtan byed kyang sems su rnam par rtog pa la gnas te /
analyzed: bsam gtan mi byed / de bsam gtan byed kyang sems su rnam par rtog pa la gnas te /
translated: Although they practice concentration, they do not practice concentration based on the body.

original: bsam gtan mi byed /üîΩde bsam gtan byed kyang sa la gnas te /
analyzed: bsam gtan mi byed / de bsam gtan byed kyang sa la gnas te /
translated: They do not practice concentration based on the mind.

original: bsam gtan mi byed /
analyzed: bsam gtan mi byed /
translated: Although they practice concentration, they do not practice concentration based on the earth element.

original: de bzhin du chu la ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du chu la ma yin /
translated: They do not practice concentration based on the water element.

original: me la ma yin /üîΩrlung la ma yin /üîΩnam mkha' la gnas te /
analyzed: me la ma yin / rlung la ma yin / nam mkha' la gnas te /
translated: They do not practice concentration based on the fire element.üîΩThey do not practice concentration based on the wind element.

original: bsam gtan mi byed do //
analyzed: bsam gtan mi byed do //
translated: They do not practice concentration based on the space element.

original: de bsam gtan byed kyang zla ba la ma yin /
analyzed: de bsam gtan byed kyang zla ba la ma yin /
translated: Although they practice concentration, they do not practice concentration based on the moon.

original: nyi ma la ma yin /
analyzed: nyi ma la ma yin /
translated: They do not practice concentration based on the sun.

original: brgya byin la ma yin /üîΩtshangs pa la ma yin /
analyzed: brgya byin la ma yin / tshangs pa la ma yin /
translated: not in ≈öakra,üîΩnot in BrahmƒÅ,

original: skye dgu'i bdag po la gnas te /
analyzed: skye dgu'i bdag po la gnas te /
translated: not in the Lord of Beings,

original: bsam gtan mi byed do //üîΩ'dod pa'i khams la gnas te /
analyzed: bsam gtan mi byed do // 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te /
translated: does one practice concentration.

original: bsam gtan mi byed do //
analyzed: bsam gtan mi byed do //
translated: One does not practice concentration dwelling in the desire realm,

original: gzugs kyi khams la ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams la ma yin /
translated: nor in the form realm,

original: gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas te /üîΩbsam gtan mi byed do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas te / bsam gtan mi byed do //
translated: nor in the formless realm.

original: de bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te /üîΩbsam gtan mi byed /
analyzed: de bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te / bsam gtan mi byed /
translated: One practices concentration, but not dwelling in this world,

original: 'jig @365b rten pha rol la gnas te /
analyzed: 'jig @365b rten pha rol la gnas te /
translated: nor in the next world,

original: bsam gtan mi byed do //
analyzed: bsam gtan mi byed do //
translated: does one practice concentration.

original: de bsam gtan byed kyang mi mtho mi dma' bar gnas te /
analyzed: de bsam gtan byed kyang mi mtho mi dma' bar gnas te /
translated: One practices concentration, but not dwelling in the high or the low,

original: mi g-yo bar gyur cing bsam gtan byed do //
analyzed: mi g-yo bar gyur cing bsam gtan byed do //
translated: one practices concentration, having become unmoving.

original: de bsam gtan byed kyang bdag nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te /
analyzed: de bsam gtan byed kyang bdag nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te /
translated: One practices concentration, but not dwelling in the view of appropriation,

original: bsam gtan mi byed do //
analyzed: bsam gtan mi byed do //
translated: does one practice concentration.

original: de bsam gtan byed kyang sems can la ma yin /
analyzed: de bsam gtan byed kyang sems can la ma yin /
translated: One practices concentration, but not in beings,

original: srog la ma yin /üîΩgso ba la ma yin /üîΩgang zag la ma yin /
analyzed: srog la ma yin / gso ba la ma yin / gang zag la ma yin /
translated: not in life,üîΩnot in a person,üîΩnot in a human,

original: shed las skyes pa la ma yin /
analyzed: shed las skyes pa la ma yin /
translated: not in a human being,

original: shed pur nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te /
analyzed: shed pur nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te /
translated: They are the ones who live by the view ofüîΩthe appropriation of the perishable aggregates.

original: bsam gtan mi byed do //
analyzed: bsam gtan mi byed do //
translated: He does not practice concentration while abiding in the view of appropriating the self.

original: de bsam gtan byed kyang chad par lta bar khas blangs te /üîΩbsam gtan mi byed do //
analyzed: de bsam gtan byed kyang chad par lta bar khas blangs te / bsam gtan mi byed do //
translated: He does not practice concentration while accepting the view of annihilation.

original: de bsam gtan byed kyang rtag par lta ba ma yin /
analyzed: de bsam gtan byed kyang rtag par lta ba ma yin /
translated: He does not practice concentration while accepting the view of permanence,

original: 'byung bar lta ba ma yin /
analyzed: 'byung bar lta ba ma yin /
translated: the view of arising,

original: 'jig par lta bar khas blangs te /üîΩbsam gtan mi byed do //
analyzed: 'jig par lta bar khas blangs te / bsam gtan mi byed do //
translated: or the view of destruction.

original: de bsam gtan byed kyang zag pa shin tu zad par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do //
analyzed: de bsam gtan byed kyang zag pa shin tu zad par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do //
translated: He does not practice concentration in order to completely exhaust the defilements.

original: de bsam gtan byed kyang skyon med pa la 'jug pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do //
analyzed: de bsam gtan byed kyang skyon med pa la 'jug pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do //
translated: He does not practice concentration in order to enter into faultlessness or to actualize the attainment of the fruits.

original: de bsam gtan byed kyang shin tu mngon par 'du mi bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do //
analyzed: de bsam gtan byed kyang shin tu mngon par 'du mi bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do //
translated: He does not practice concentration in order to completely transcend karma.

original: de stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang /
analyzed: de stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang /
translated: He practices concentration in order to cultivate the concentration of emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do //üîΩde mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do // de mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang /
translated: but he does not meditate in order to actualize the signless concentration.üîΩHe meditates in order to cultivate the wishless concentration,üîΩbut he does not meditate in order to actualize the wishless concentration.üîΩHe meditates in order to cultivate the concentration of the sphere of infinite space,üîΩbut he does not meditate in order to actualize the concentration of the sphere of infinite space.üîΩHe meditates in order to cultivate the concentration of the sphere of infinite consciousness,üîΩbut he does not meditate in order to actualize the concentration of the sphere of infinite consciousness.üîΩHe meditates in order to cultivate the concentration of the sphere of nothingness,üîΩbut he does not meditate in order to actualize the concentration of the sphere of nothingness.üîΩHe meditates in order to cultivate the concentration of the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception,

original: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do //üîΩ@366a *// de smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do // @366a *// de smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang /
translated: but he does not meditate in order to actualize the concentration of the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.üîΩHe meditates in order to cultivate the concentration of cessation,üîΩbut he does not meditate in order to actualize the concentration of cessation.üîΩHe meditates in order to cultivate the four applications of mindfulness,

original: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do //üîΩde byams pa chen po'i go bgos /
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do // de byams pa chen po'i go bgos /
translated: but he does not meditate in order to abandon the defilements through the applications of mindfulness.üîΩHe meditates in order to cultivate the four right efforts,üîΩbut he does not meditate in order to abandon unwholesome factors or to produce wholesome factors.

original: snying rje chen po'i byin gyis brlabs la gnas te /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i byin gyis brlabs la gnas te /
translated: He meditates in order to cultivate the four bases of supernatural power,üîΩbut he does not meditate in order to obtain the supernatural knowledge of the bases of supernatural power.üîΩHe meditates in order to cultivate the five faculties,üîΩbut he does not meditate in order to obtain the fruits of the ≈õrama·πáa.üîΩHe meditates in order to cultivate the five powers,üîΩbut he does not meditate in order to obtain the fruits of the brƒÅhma·πáa.üîΩHe meditates in order to cultivate the seven factors of awakening,üîΩbut he does not meditate in order to obtain the fruits of the universal monarch.üîΩHe meditates in order to cultivate the noble eightfold path,üîΩbut he does not meditate in order to obtain the fruits of the universal monarch.

original: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa bsam gtan du byed do //üîΩde la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa bsam gtan du byed do //üîΩde la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: He meditates in order to cultivate the four noble truths,üîΩbut he does not meditate in order to obtain the fruits of the universal monarch.üîΩHe meditates

original: sbyin pa ma tshang ba med pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa ma tshang ba med pa /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is generosity without deficiency.üîΩIt is morality without deficiency.

original: tshul khrims ma tshang ba med pa; bzod pa ma tshang ba med pa /
analyzed: tshul khrims ma tshang ba med pa; bzod pa ma tshang ba med pa /
translated: It is patience without deficiency.

original: brtson 'grus ma tshang ba med pa /
analyzed: brtson 'grus ma tshang ba med pa /
translated: It is effort without deficiency.

original: bsam gtan ma tshang ba med pa /
analyzed: bsam gtan ma tshang ba med pa /
translated: It is meditation without deficiency.

original: shes rab ma tshang ba med pa /
analyzed: shes rab ma tshang ba med pa /
translated: It is wisdom without deficiency.

original: thabs ma tshang ba med pa /üîΩbyams pa chen po ma tshang ba med pa /
analyzed: thabs ma tshang ba med pa / byams pa chen po ma tshang ba med pa /
translated: It is method without deficiency.üîΩIt is great love without deficiency.

original: snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms ma tshang ba med pa /
analyzed: snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms ma tshang ba med pa /
translated: It is great compassion, joy, and equanimity without deficiency.

original: bden pa shes pa la 'jug pa ma tshang ba med pa /
analyzed: bden pa shes pa la 'jug pa ma tshang ba med pa /
translated: It is the entry into the knowledge of the truths without deficiency.

original: byang chub kyi sems sems can la lta ba ma tshang ba med pa dang / bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba ma tshang ba med pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems sems can la lta ba ma tshang ba med pa dang / bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba ma tshang ba med pa /
translated: It is the view of the mind of awakening and of sentient beings without deficiency, and it is the application of the mind and higher mind without deficiency.

original: sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don byed pa dang / don mthun pa ma tshang ba med pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don byed pa dang / don mthun pa ma tshang ba med pa /
translated: It is generosity, pleasant speech, meaningful activity, and consistency without deficiency.

original: dran pa dang shes bzhin ma tshang ba med pa /
analyzed: dran pa dang shes bzhin ma tshang ba med pa /
translated: It is mindfulness and vigilance without deficiency.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub @366b kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan brgyad pa ma tshang ba med pa /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub @366b kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan brgyad pa ma tshang ba med pa /
translated: and the eightfold noble path are complete.

original: zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong ma tshang ba med pa /üîΩsbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / des pa ma tshang ba med pa /
analyzed: zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong ma tshang ba med pa / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / des pa ma tshang ba med pa /
translated: It is complete with tranquility and insight.üîΩIt is complete with generosity, discipline, restraint, and gentleness.

original: ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa ma tshang ba med pa /
analyzed: ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa ma tshang ba med pa /
translated: It is complete with a sense of shame and a sense of decency.

original: mi dge ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa /
translated: It is not associated with nonvirtuous qualities.

original: dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa /
translated: It is associated with all virtuous qualities.

original: sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi chad pas byin gyis brlabs pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi chad pas byin gyis brlabs pa /
translated: It is blessed by the unbroken continuity of the Buddha's way.

original: chos kyi tshul 'bar bas yang dag par bsdus ba /
analyzed: chos kyi tshul 'bar bas yang dag par bsdus ba /
translated: It is subsumed by the blazing way of the Dharma.

original: dge 'dun gyi tshul yongs su sdud pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi tshul yongs su sdud pa dang ldan pa /
translated: It is endowed with the gathering of the way of the Sa·πÖgha.

original: sems can thams cad la lta bas byin gyis brlabs pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la lta bas byin gyis brlabs pa /
translated: It is blessed by looking upon all sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su bsgrubs pas legs par brgyan pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su bsgrubs pas legs par brgyan pa /
translated: He was well adorned with the perfect body of a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par bsngos pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par bsngos pa /
translated: He had dedicated himself to the perfect voice of a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa /
translated: He had the sameness of the samadhi of a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He had the miracles and discernments of a buddha.

original: stobs bcu'i stobs kyis yang dag par bzung ba /
analyzed: stobs bcu'i stobs kyis yang dag par bzung ba /
translated: He was held by the power of the ten powers.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la rab tu gnas pa /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la rab tu gnas pa /
translated: He was established in the four fearlessnesses.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang rjes su mthun pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ma 'dres pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang rjes su mthun pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ma 'dres pa /
translated: He was in accord with the eighteen unique qualities of a buddha and was not mixed with the vehicles of the shravakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa bsal ba /
analyzed: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa bsal ba /
translated: He had removed the afflictions of the connection of traces.

original: mngon par shes pa'i ye shes dang ma bral ba /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i ye shes dang ma bral ba /
translated: He was not separated from the wisdom of the superknowledges.

original: sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa /
translated: He was the teacher of all sentient beings.

original: ston pa bzhi thob pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid thob pa /
analyzed: ston pa bzhi thob pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid thob pa /
translated: He had attained the sameness of the mundane and supramundane dharmas through attaining the fourfold teaching.

original: sems can thams cad @367a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad @367a *//
translated: It is the ripening of all sentient beings.

original: yongs su smin par byed pas ma smad pa /
analyzed: yongs su smin par byed pas ma smad pa /
translated: It is not contemptible because it ripens all sentient beings.

original: drang ba / mkhas pa /
analyzed: drang ba / mkhas pa /
translated: It is straight, skilled,

original: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba /
translated: and removes the suffering of all sentient beings.

original: nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyong ba /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyong ba /
translated: It purifies all afflictions.

original: chu bo las sgrol ba /
analyzed: chu bo las sgrol ba /
translated: It liberates from the four rivers.

original: 'dzin pa thams cad gcod pa /
analyzed: 'dzin pa thams cad gcod pa /
translated: It severs all grasping.

original: rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba /
translated: It is naturally peaceful.

original: las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis nye bar zhi ba /
analyzed: las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis nye bar zhi ba /
translated: It is peaceful through karma and afflictions.

original: chos nyid kyis btang snyoms pa /
analyzed: chos nyid kyis btang snyoms pa /
translated: It is neutral through reality.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lta ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lta ba /
translated: It is the view of all the qualities of the buddhas.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis bems po byin gyis brlab bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba med pa /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis bems po byin gyis brlab bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba med pa /
translated: It is not liberated because it is blessed to be naturally dull.

original: rang gi ngang gis lung du ma bstan pa /
analyzed: rang gi ngang gis lung du ma bstan pa /
translated: It is naturally neutral.

original: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la rtag tu brtson pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la rtag tu brtson pa /
translated: It is always striving for the activities of the buddhas.

original: nye bar zhi bas bsil bar gyur pa /
analyzed: nye bar zhi bas bsil bar gyur pa /
translated: It is cool through peace.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la rtag tu 'bar ba ste /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la rtag tu 'bar ba ste /
translated: It is always blazing in order to ripen sentient beings.

original: 'di ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness endowed with the most sublime of manifestations.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: 'di lta ste /üîΩdper na / yongs su brtag pa bzung ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dper na / yongs su brtag pa bzung ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad ri mo mkhan bzo tha dad par bslabs pa /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad ri mo mkhan bzo tha dad par bslabs pa /
translated: Imagine that all the sentient beings in the great trichiliocosm were to train in the arts of painting,

original: yan lag rnam par phye ba tha dad du bslabs par gyur te /
analyzed: yan lag rnam par phye ba tha dad du bslabs par gyur te /
translated: training in the different aspects of the body.

original: de la la la ni sa gcod pa la mkhas kyang 'bri ba la mi mkhas /
analyzed: de la la la ni sa gcod pa la mkhas kyang 'bri ba la mi mkhas /
translated: Some would be skilled in the layout but not in the drawing,

original: la la ni gtan la 'bebs pa la mkhas kyang yan lag dang nying lag la mi mkhas /
analyzed: la la ni gtan la 'bebs pa la mkhas kyang yan lag dang nying lag la mi mkhas /
translated: some would be skilled in the layout and the drawing but not in the limbs and minor parts,

original: kha cig rkang lag 'bri ba la mkhas kyang mig dang mgo bo dang rna ba 'bri ba la mi mkhas pa dag @367b cig yin la /
analyzed: kha cig rkang lag 'bri ba la mkhas kyang mig dang mgo bo dang rna ba 'bri ba la mi mkhas pa dag @367b cig yin la /

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: de ltar rnam pa tha dad du bslabs pa /
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa tha dad du bslabs pa /
translated: in this way, they would train in different aspects,

original: yan lag rnams rnam par dbye ba la tha dad du bslabs pas gzugs tha dad du bslabs pa'i ri mo mkhan de dag thams cad la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas ras shig byin te /
analyzed: yan lag rnams rnam par dbye ba la tha dad du bslabs pas gzugs tha dad du bslabs pa'i ri mo mkhan de dag thams cad la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas ras shig byin te /
translated: The king, a k·π£atriya anointed on the crown of his head, gave them a piece of cloth and said,

original: khyed rnams kyis ras 'di la nga'i gzugs bris te 'on cig /
analyzed: khyed rnams kyis ras 'di la nga'i gzugs bris te 'on cig /
translated: ‚ÄòYou must paint my form on this cloth and bring it back.

original: khyed cag thams cad kyis kyang 'di la ri mor bris shig /
analyzed: khyed cag thams cad kyis kyang 'di la ri mor bris shig /
translated: All of you must paint it.‚Äô

original: de nas ri mo mkhan de dag tshogs nas ras de brgyangs pa las /
analyzed: de nas ri mo mkhan de dag tshogs nas ras de brgyangs pa las /
translated: ‚ÄúThen all the painters gathered and stretched out the cloth.

original: ri mo mkhan de dag gi nang nas ri mo mkhan gcig cig yul gzhan zhig tu song bar gyur la /
analyzed: ri mo mkhan de dag gi nang nas ri mo mkhan gcig cig yul gzhan zhig tu song bar gyur la /
translated: But one of the painters went to another country.

original: de nas ri mo mkhan phyi ma de dag gis de la rgyal po de'i gzugs bris na /üîΩrigs kyi bu /
analyzed: de nas ri mo mkhan phyi ma de dag gis de la rgyal po de'i gzugs bris na / rigs kyi bu /
translated: Then the remaining painters painted the king‚Äôs form on it.

original: 'di ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: 'di ji snyam du sems /
translated: ‚ÄúSon of noble family, what do you think?

original: ri mo mkhan gcig po de'i lag tu ma blangs na ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: ri mo mkhan gcig po de'i lag tu ma blangs na ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ram /
translated: Would that piece of cloth have all the best features if it were not taken into the hands of that one painter?‚Äù

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, ‚ÄúBlessed One, it would not.‚Äù

original: de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni ma lags so //
translated: ‚ÄúNo, Blessed One, it is not.‚Äù

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: ‚ÄúNoble son,

original: de ltar na ji tsam du don rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir 'di dper byas te /
analyzed: de ltar na ji tsam du don rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir 'di dper byas te /
translated: it is in this way that this analogy is used to make the knowable known.

original: 'di'i don cir lta zhe na /
analyzed: 'di'i don cir lta zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of this analogy?

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Noble son,

original: ji ltar ri mo mkhan gcig po de med na ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar ri mo mkhan gcig po de med na ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
translated: just as that cloth would not have all the best qualities if it were not for the painter,

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: noble son,

original: rnam pa ji snyed dang / spyod pa ji snyed dang / brtson pa ji snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dag las gal te rnam pa gcig ma bstan na yang /
analyzed: rnam pa ji snyed dang / spyod pa ji snyed dang / brtson pa ji snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dag las gal te rnam pa gcig ma bstan na yang /

analyzed: @368a *// rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: it would not be the emptiness that has all the best qualities.

original: nam sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par bsdus shing lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang / mtshan ma la dmigs pa'i spros pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de na byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: nam sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par bsdus shing lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang / mtshan ma la dmigs pa'i spros pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de na byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid yin no //
translated: When all the aspects of the Buddha‚Äôs teachings are completely included, and when one does not dwell together with any of the elaborations that consist of views, afflictions, and the observation of signs, then that is the bodhisattva‚Äôs emptiness that is endowed with the most sublime of all aspects.

original: bstan pa 'di nges par bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong gis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la bzod pa rab tu thob bo //
analyzed: bstan pa 'di nges par bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong gis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la bzod pa rab tu thob bo //
translated: When this teaching was explained, eight thousand bodhisattvas attained the acceptance that phenomena are not produced.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: this is the bodhisattvas‚Äô completely purified perfection of meditative concentration.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
translated: what is the bodhisattvas‚Äô completely purified perfection of insight?

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: 'di la byang chub byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab yongs su dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab yongs su dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: Here, bodhisattvas have twelve kinds of completely pure wisdom.

original: rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na /
translated: What are the twelve?

original: 'di lta ste /üîΩsngon gyi mtha' la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / sngon gyi mtha' la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /
translated: They are as follows:üîΩTheir wisdom and gnosis vision is unattached and unobstructed with regard to the past.üîΩTheir wisdom and gnosis vision is unattached and unobstructed with regard to the future.üîΩTheir wisdom and gnosis vision is unattached and unobstructed with regard to the present.

original: da ltar byung ba la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa @368b med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa @368b med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /
translated: Their wisdom and gnosis vision is unattached and unobstructed with regard to the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas thams cad la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas thams cad la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /
translated: It is to have the insight and wisdom to engage in the unconditioned without attachment or obstruction. It is to have the insight and wisdom to engage in all the mundane arts and crafts without attachment or obstruction.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /
translated: It is to have the insight and wisdom to engage in the supramundane without attachment or obstruction. It is to have the insight and wisdom to engage in the knowledge of dependent origination without attachment or obstruction.

original: bden pa shes pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / kun rdzob bstan pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: bden pa shes pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / kun rdzob bstan pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /
translated: Their wisdom and insight into the teachings of the ultimate truth is unattached and unobstructed.

original: don dam pa bsten pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po dang brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: don dam pa bsten pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po dang brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the different faculties and diligence of sentient beings,

original: rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma'i dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas sems can thams cad la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing @369a *//üîΩthogs pa med par 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma'i dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas sems can thams cad la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing @369a *//üîΩthogs pa med par 'jug pa yin te /
translated: they know the superior and inferior faculties of the highest, middling, and lowest. Their wisdom and insight into all sentient beings is unattached and unobstructed.

original: de'i shes rab de yang 'phags pa zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa /
analyzed: de'i shes rab de yang 'phags pa zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa /
translated: and beyond the world. It is in accord with the factors that lead toüîΩpenetration.üîΩIt is difficult to fathom because it is in accord with the thoughts of

original: sems can gyi bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ni gting dpag dka' ste /
analyzed: sems can gyi bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ni gting dpag dka' ste /
translated: sentient beings.

original: mthong bar dka' zhing zab la /
analyzed: mthong bar dka' zhing zab la /
translated: It is profound and difficult to see.

original: khong du chud par dka' ba bye brag phyed cing /
analyzed: khong du chud par dka' ba bye brag phyed cing /
translated: It is difficult to understand, but it is distinguished,

original: nges par rtog pa /
analyzed: nges par rtog pa /
translated: definite,

original: lta ba dang bral ba /
analyzed: lta ba dang bral ba /
translated: and free from views.

original: bag chags bsal ba /
analyzed: bag chags bsal ba /
translated: It has eliminated habitual tendencies.

original: bdag stong pa nyid du rtogs pa /
analyzed: bdag stong pa nyid du rtogs pa /
translated: It is the realization of the emptiness of self.

original: thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa /
analyzed: thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa /
translated: It is in accord with the emptiness of everything.

original: chos stong pa nyid kyi tshul shes pa /
analyzed: chos stong pa nyid kyi tshul shes pa /
translated: It is the knowledge of the way of the emptiness of phenomena.

original: don la nges par rtog pa /üîΩshin tu lcigs pa /
analyzed: don la nges par rtog pa / shin tu lcigs pa /
translated: It is the definite realization of the meaning.üîΩIt is very heavy.

original: shin tu sbyangs pa /
analyzed: shin tu sbyangs pa /
translated: It is very refined.

original: ci yang snang ba med pa /
analyzed: ci yang snang ba med pa /
translated: It is the absence of any appearance.

original: 'gal ba med pa /
analyzed: 'gal ba med pa /
translated: It is without contradiction.

original: ma 'gags pa /
analyzed: ma 'gags pa /
translated: It is unceasing.

original: dus dang dus ma yin pa la rtog pa /
analyzed: dus dang dus ma yin pa la rtog pa /
translated: It is the understanding of what is timely and untimely.

original: dus las mi 'da' ba /
analyzed: dus las mi 'da' ba /
translated: It is not beyond time.

original: skyon med pa /
analyzed: skyon med pa /
translated: It is faultless.üîΩIt is well guarded.

original: legs par bsrungs pa; skyon med pa la dga' ba /
analyzed: legs par bsrungs pa; skyon med pa la dga' ba /
translated: It is the delight in faultlessness.

original: bden pa khong du chud pa /
analyzed: bden pa khong du chud pa /
translated: It is the understanding of the truth.

original: 'gog pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs pa /üîΩshin tu brgal ba /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs pa / shin tu brgal ba /
translated: He had realized the truth of cessation.üîΩHe had gone beyond all extremes.

original: thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa /
analyzed: thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa /
translated: He was without any wrongdoing.

original: gcig tu spyod pa med pa spyod pa; legs par spyad pa spyod pa /
analyzed: gcig tu spyod pa med pa spyod pa; legs par spyad pa spyod pa /
translated: He was the one who practiced without practicing, who practiced good conduct.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la spyod pa /
translated: He was the one who practiced the conduct of the minds of all sentient beings.

original: 'jig rten thams cad las phyir log kyang gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad las phyir log kyang gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa /
translated: He had turned away from all worlds, yet he had not come from anywhere.

original: yul thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang sangs rgyas kyi yul las phyir ma log pa /
analyzed: yul thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang sangs rgyas kyi yul las phyir ma log pa /
translated: He had transcended all objects, yet he had not turned away from the domain of the buddhas.üîΩHe had transcended all undertakings, yet he had not turned away from ripening beings.

original: brtsom  pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed pa las phyir ma log @369b pa; spyod pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang dge ba'i spyod pa las phyir ma log pa /
analyzed: brtsom  pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed pa las phyir ma log @369b pa; spyod pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang dge ba'i spyod pa las phyir ma log pa /
translated: He had transcended all conduct, yet he had not turned away from virtuous conduct.

original: sems kyi dmigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa las phyir ma lag pa /
analyzed: sems kyi dmigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa las phyir ma lag pa /
translated: He had transcended all mental references, yet he had not turned away from the conduct of the minds of all beings.

original: nye bar len pa la spyod kyang nye bar len pa med par 'bar ba /
analyzed: nye bar len pa la spyod kyang nye bar len pa med par 'bar ba /
translated: They blaze without appropriation, even though they engage in appropriation.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos kyang 'jig rten dang ma bral ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos kyang 'jig rten dang ma bral ba /
translated: They are unstained by any worldly phenomena, even though they are not separate from the world.

original: lus med kyang sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: lus med kyang sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'o //
translated: They have no body, even though they engage in the conduct and thoughts of all sentient beings.

original: de'i shes rab de yang de'i ngang tshul la spyod pa myur du khong du chud par dbang po smin par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: de'i shes rab de yang de'i ngang tshul la spyod pa myur du khong du chud par dbang po smin par 'gyur ba /
translated: Their wisdom is such that their faculties are matured for quickly understanding the way of that wisdom.

original: yun ring por lta ba /
analyzed: yun ring por lta ba /
translated: They have a long view.

original: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i chos la brtson pa /
analyzed: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i chos la brtson pa /
translated: They are always and continuously diligent in virtuous qualities.

original: byang chub kyi snying po la gzhol ba /
analyzed: byang chub kyi snying po la gzhol ba /
translated: They are intent on the essence of awakening.

original: dge ba sbyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: dge ba sbyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: They engage in the practice of virtuous generosity.

original: nye bar len pa med par 'bar ba /
analyzed: nye bar len pa med par 'bar ba /
translated: They blaze without appropriation.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
translated: They are blessed by all the buddhas.

original: bdud thams cad 'dul ba /
analyzed: bdud thams cad 'dul ba /
translated: They tame all the mƒÅras.

original: sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa /
translated: They satisfy all sentient beings.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba /
translated: They see the wisdom of omniscience.

original: don thams cad rjes su rtogs pa /
analyzed: don thams cad rjes su rtogs pa /
translated: They realize all meanings.

original: chos thams cad ro mtshungs pa; thabs thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ro mtshungs pa; thabs thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba'o //
translated: all dharmas are of one taste, and all means are perfectly grasped.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni srid pa'i pha rol tu song ba dang dpag tu med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni srid pa'i pha rol tu song ba dang dpag tu med pa'i phyir /
translated: because the perfection of wisdom has gone beyond existence and is immeasurable,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: it is called the perfection of wisdom.

original: mtshan ma thams cad dang / dmigs pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pas de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes @370a *//
analyzed: mtshan ma thams cad dang / dmigs pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pas de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes @370a *//
translated: Because it has gone beyond all signs, all objects, and all mental activity of sentient beings, it is called the perfection of wisdom.

original: bya'o; ;de'i shes rab yongs su dag pa ni gnyis te /
analyzed: bya'o; ;de'i shes rab yongs su dag pa ni gnyis te /
translated: Its wisdom is twofold:

original: gnyis gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnyis gang zhe na /
translated: What are the two?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa /
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa /
translated: the purity of the characteristic of nonattachment

original: thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: and the purity of the characteristic of unobstructed wisdom.

original: de dag ni yongs su dag pa gnyis so //
analyzed: de dag ni yongs su dag pa gnyis so //

original: gzhan yang yongs su dag pa gnyis te /
analyzed: gzhan yang yongs su dag pa gnyis te /
